actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill for the relief of Somjai Sriweownetr and Chaluay Sriweownetr, husband and wife, and their children, Somkiat Sriweownetr, Siriluck Sriweownetr and Luckana Sriweownetr.

summary.text: Declares five named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Somjai Sriweownetr and Chaluay Sriweownetr, husband and wife, and their children, Somkiat Sriweownetr, Siriluck Sriweownetr and Luckana Sriweownetr.
